    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ActionStrategy
    Strategy pattern: defines how a unit performs its action.
    ConsumeStrategy
    Default robot strategy: just consume from the buffer.
    ConveyorBelt
    A conveyor belt that moves items and tracks how many items itâ€™s moved.
    ConveyorBeltTest
     
    FactoryUI
    Modern Swing UI to visualize the Smart Factory simulation with real-time updates and interactive controls.
    FloatWorkerStatistic
    Use this as a general class for holding Float-based statistics.
    Main
     
    Matrix
    The class that is responsible for running the simulation.
    MatrixTest
     
    MetricsComponent
    This class is used to keep track of Skeleton.Statistic instances by name
    Robot
     
    RobotTest
     
    SharedBuffer<T>
    A bounded buffer where ConveyorBelts put items and Robots take them.
    SimulationInput
    This class helps you retrieve values from the given input.
    Statistic
    This class is used to represent a Skeleton.Statistic.
    StatisticObserver
    Observer for statistic updates.
    Statistics
    This class contains the set of statistics for an object in the simulation.
    StatisticsContainer
    Singleton object for all statistics.
    Unit
    Abstract class that represents a unit in the simulation.
    UnitFactory
    Factory Method: creates Units by type.
    WorkerStatistic
    Use this as a general class for holding Integer-based statistics.
